ext_description.message: Highlight any part of a page by drawing a selection rectangle like on your desktop.

help_text.description: Help text in modal window that describes the functionality.
help_text.message: Clip To Search 1.0 to be released!

launch_error.description: Error message that is shown if the extension cannot be used on the current page.
launch_error.message: Activation prevented by the browser. Please try again on a different page. This extension cannot be used on chrome:// URLs or on the Chrome Web Store. It works on file:// URLs if you authorize it via the extension management page in Chrome.
